languages.text: {n}Джай старается говорить по-деловому равнодушно, но плечи ее опускаются, словно под тяжелым грузом, во взгляд пробирается затравленное выражение, а уголок губ трагически кривится.{/n}

{n}Jae is striving to maintain her business-like air of indifference, but her shoulders are sagging as though under a heavy weight, a haunted look flickers in her eyes, and her mouth is set in a forlorn moue.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Джай старается говорить по-деловому равнодушно, но плечи ее опускаются, словно под тяжелым грузом, во взгляд пробирается затравленное выражение, а уголок губ трагически кривится.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae is striving to maintain her business-like air of indifference, but her shoulders are sagging as though under a heavy weight, a haunted look flickers in her eyes, and her mouth is set in a forlorn moue.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae is striving to maintain her business-like air of indifference, but her shoulders are sagging as though under a heavy weight, a haunted look flickers in her eyes, and her mouth is set in a forlorn moue.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}婕伊尽可能地保持着公事公办的冷漠表情，但她的肩膀却耷拉着，仿佛肩负着沉重的负担。她的眼中流露着幽怨的神情，嘴角泛起一丝孤寂。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jae is striving to maintain her business-like air of indifference, but her shoulders are sagging as though under a heavy weight, a haunted look flickers in her eyes, and her mouth is set in a forlorn moue.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊尽可能地保持着公事公办的冷漠表情，但她的肩膀却耷拉着，仿佛肩负着沉重的负担。她的眼中流露着幽怨的神情，嘴角泛起一丝孤寂。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}ジェイはビジネスライクな無関心さを保とうと努力しているが、肩は重石を背負ったように落ち、目には憑かれたような表情がちらつき、口元は寂しげな表情を浮かべている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jae is striving to maintain her business-like air of indifference, but her shoulders are sagging as though under a heavy weight, a haunted look flickers in her eyes, and her mouth is set in a forlorn moue.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ジェイはビジネスライクな無関心さを保とうと努力しているが、肩は重石を背負ったように落ち、目には憑かれたような表情がちらつき、口元は寂しげな表情を浮かべている。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae se esfuerza por mantener un aire de profesionalidad indiferente, pero tiene los hombros caídos como si soportasen una pesada carga, luce una expresión atribulada y su boca está contraída en una mueca de disgusto.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jae is striving to maintain her business-like air of indifference, but her shoulders are sagging as though under a heavy weight, a haunted look flickers in her eyes, and her mouth is set in a forlorn moue.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae se esfuerza por mantener un aire de profesionalidad indiferente, pero tiene los hombros caídos como si soportasen una pesada carga, luce una expresión atribulada y su boca está contraída en una mueca de disgusto.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae s'efforce de préserver son air indifférent de femme d'affaires, mais ses épaules tombent comme sous un poids énorme, ses yeux sont hantés et ses lèvres forment une moue mélancolique.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jae is striving to maintain her business-like air of indifference, but her shoulders are sagging as though under a heavy weight, a haunted look flickers in her eyes, and her mouth is set in a forlorn moue.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae s'efforce de préserver son air indifférent de femme d'affaires, mais ses épaules tombent comme sous un poids énorme, ses yeux sont hantés et ses lèvres forment une moue mélancolique.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae versucht sich weiter gleichgültig zu geben, aber ihre Schultern hängen, als hätten sie eine schwere Last zu tragen, dazu ist ihr Blick verzagt und ihre Miene trostlos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jae is striving to maintain her business-like air of indifference, but her shoulders are sagging as though under a heavy weight, a haunted look flickers in her eyes, and her mouth is set in a forlorn moue.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae versucht sich weiter gleichgültig zu geben, aber ihre Schultern hängen, als hätten sie eine schwere Last zu tragen, dazu ist ihr Blick verzagt und ihre Miene trostlos.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae, iş yapar gibi görünen umursamaz havasını korumaya çalışıyor. Ancak omuzları, üzerilerine ağır bir yükün ağırlığı binmiş gibi çökmüş; gözlerinde yanıp sönen tekinsiz bir parıltı var ve dudaklarıysa ümitsizce bükülmüş.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jae is striving to maintain her business-like air of indifference, but her shoulders are sagging as though under a heavy weight, a haunted look flickers in her eyes, and her mouth is set in a forlorn moue.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae, iş yapar gibi görünen umursamaz havasını korumaya çalışıyor ama omuzları, üzerilerine ağır bir yükün ağırlığı binmiş gibi çökmüş, gözlerinde yanıp sönen tekinsiz bir parıltı var ve dudakları ümitsizce bükülmüş.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
